title: Easy chair
text:
Frank Lloyd Wright created this easy chair for a house he designed in Peoria, Illinois for Francis W. Little.  This chair's back is adjustable, giving a bit more comfort to the user than most of Wright's rectilinear furniture.  Little became Wright's close friend and financial supporter.  

A decade later, Wright built a second home for Little, overlooking Lake Minnetonka in Deephaven, Minnesota.  The home's hallway, as well as a model representing the house, are displayed in this gallery.
